channel.title: Development on barvey hirdman @ brvy.win
channel.description: Recent content in Development on barvey hirdman @ brvy.win

item.title: Game Challenge(?)
item.description: The last few weeks I’ve been toying with the idea of making a game quite a lot. From time to time I have this thing but I usually don’t act on it. However… this time I started thinking about the concept I have in mind and I feel like it’s something I could do and it would be cool as heck. Without saying too much about the game and the concept (although some people I’ve already told) it’s relatively simple graphics-wise as it would only use plain GUI elements (text boxes, frames, charts, etc) like an accounting program.
